Rubyisms with a flavor of Active Support

Posted by David

Err the Blog has a great Rails-flavored version of the Ruby Inside Advent Calendar. Instead of just focusing on vanilla Ruby, Chris gives you the lowdown on all those lovely Active Support extensions to the core classes that makes everything a little bit sweeter.
